column4: hmm so i upgraded to ubuntu. but the fonts in firefox look a little fuzzy
that didn't help :|  i don't have a .fonts.conf
try creating the one at the bottom of the bug report
you also have to restart X of course
beats me, i've always had to restart x to make it work
ok i'll test it out and get back to  you
ok, so it actually needs a new font conf file, not just removing it
it's not as nice as it used to be though
yeah i think it's one of the antialiasing modes are broken.  it's why it's a workaround, not a fix
still, at least it's readable now
i hope an update gets pushed in a week =)
gaim2.0 also feels really really sluggish
can't help there, i don't use gaim
